Arathorn's Stand.warning: This force must contain Arathorn, who will always be your leader.

Army of Arnor.warning: This force must contain Arvedui, who will always be your leader.

Army of Carn Dum.warning: This force must contain the Aldrac, who will always be your leader.

Army of Dunland.warning: This force must contain Thrydan Wolfsbane.

Assault Upon Helm's Deep.warning: This force must contain an Uruk-Hai Captain (Leader).

Assault on Lothlorien.warning: This force must always include Muzgur.
This force must always include at least one named Goblin Hero model.

Battle of Fornost.warning: This force must contain Earnur, Last King of Gondor.

Buhrdur's Horde.warning: This force must contain Burdhur, who will always be your leader.

Defenders of Erebor.warning: This force must contain at least one named Erebor Hero model.
This force must contain at least one named Dale Hero model.

Defenders of the Shire.warning: This force must contain Meriadoc, Captain of the Shire.
This force must contain Peregrin, Captain of the Shire.

Depths of Moria.warning: This force must contain The Balrog.

Grand Army of the South.warning: This force must contain either Suladan or The Mumak War Leader.
This force must contain at least one Mumak model.

Grimbeorn.warning: Thranduil must be included for the Historical alliance level between Grimbeorn and the Halls of Thranduil.

Helm's Guard.warning: This force must contain Helm Hammerhand.

Host of the Witch-King.warning: This force must contain the Witch-King, who will always be your leader.

Murin & Drar.warning: Cirion must be included for the Historical alliance level between Murin & Drar and Minas Tirith.

Paths of the Druadan.warning: Ghan-Buri-Ghan's warband must contain a full warband of Woses Warriors.

Rangers of Mirkwood.warning: This force must contain either Legolas or Tauriel.

Rise of the Necromancer.warning: This force must contain the Necromancer of Dol Guldur.

The Army of Dale.warning: This force must contain Brand, King of Dale.

The Black Gate Opens.warning: This force must contain the Mordor Troll Chieftain (Leader), who is a Hero of Valour.

The Black Riders.warning: This force must contain the Witch King.

The Host of the Dragon Emperor.warning: This force must contain the Dragon Emperor.

The Kingdom of Moria.warning: This force must contain Balin, as the The Kingdom of Moria is a special rule for him specifically.

The Men of the West.warning: This force must contain Aragorn, King Elessar.

The Return of the King.warning: This force must contain Aragorn, Strider.
This force must contain the King of the Dead.

Thrain the Broken (Evil).warning: The Necromancer must be included for the Historical alliance level between Thrain the Broken (Evil) and the Dark Powers of Dol Guldur.

Thrain the Broken (Good).warning: Gandalf the Grey must be included for the Historical alliance level between Thrain the Broken (Good) and The White Council.

Vanquishers of the Necromancer.warning: This force must contain Galadriel, Lady of Light.
This force must contain Saruman the White.
This force must contain Gandalf the Grey.

Wolf Pack of Angmar.warning: This force must contain the Wild Warg Chieftain (Leader).

[army_of_lake-town] alfrid_the_councillo.warning: (Army of Lake-town) Alfrid the Councillor may only be included if your army also includes either Bard the Bowman or the Master of Lake-town.

[arnor] dunedain.warning: (Arnor) Dunedain may only be taken as part of Arnor if your force also includes Aranarth.

[arnor] ranger_of_the_north.warning: (Arnor) Rangers of the North may only be taken as part of Arnor if your force also includes Aranarth.

[dark_denizens_of_mirkwood] bat_swarm_cp.warning: A Bat Swarm may only lead a warband if your army also includes The Spider Queen
(Dark Denizens of Mirkwood) Warrior models may not lead warbands if the alliance level is 'Convenient' or 'Impossible', due to losing the necessary army bonus.

[dark_denizens_of_mirkwood] fell_warg_cp.warning: A Fell Warg may only lead a warband if your army also includes The Spider Queen
(Dark Denizens of Mirkwood) Warrior models may not lead warbands if the alliance level is 'Convenient' or 'Impossible', due to losing the necessary army bonus.

[dark_denizens_of_mirkwood] giant_spider.warning: A Giant Spider may only lead a warband if your army also includes The Spider Queen
(Dark Denizens of Mirkwood) Warrior models may not lead warbands if the alliance level is 'Convenient' or 'Impossible', due to losing the necessary army bonus.

[dark_denizens_of_mirkwood] mirkwood_spi.warning: A Mirkwood Spider may only lead a warband if your army also includes The Spider Queen
(Dark Denizens of Mirkwood) Warrior models may not lead warbands if the alliance level is 'Convenient' or 'Impossible', due to losing the necessary army bonus.

[dark_powers_of_dol_guldur] thrain_the_b.warning: (Dark Powers of Dol Goldur) Thrain the Broken may only be included if the Necromancer of Dol Guldur is also in your army.

[erebor_reclaimed_(king_thorin)] iron_hi.warning: The Iron Hills Chariot (with Champions of Erebor) cannot be chosen in combination with either Balin the Dwarf Champion of Erebor, Dwalin the Dwarf Champion of Erebor, Kili the Dwarf Champion of Erebor, Fili the Dwarf Champion of Erebor.

[minas_tirith] aragorn,_king_elessar.warning: Aragorn, King Elessar cannot be included in the same force as Boromir or Denethor.

[minas_tirith] earnur.warning: If Earnur is included in your force, you automatically become impossible allies with all other army lists.
If Earnur is included in the same force as any named Gondor Hero models, you automatically lose your army bonus.

[minas_tirith] king_of_men.warning: The King of Men cannot be included in the same force as any other named Gondor Hero models.

[mordor] bat_swarm.warning: Orc Captains may only include Bat Swarms in their warband if Razgush is in your army.

[mordor] fell_warg.warning: Orc Captains may only include Fell Wargs in their warband if Razgush is in your army.

[mordor] giant_spider.warning: Orc Captains may only include Giant Spiders in their warband if Razgush is in your army.

[mordor] mirkwood_spider.warning: Orc Captains may only include Mirkwood Spiders in their warband if Razgush is in your army.

[rangers_of_Ithilien] samwise_gamgee.warning: Sam may only be included if your force also contains both Frodo.

[rangers_of_ithilien] smeagol.warning: Smeagol may only be included if your force also contains both Frodo and Sam.

[rivendell] gil-galad.warning: If Gil-Galad is included in the your force, all alliances become impossible except for Numenor (Historical) and Lothlorien, Fangorn and The Misty Mountains (Convenient).
If Gil-Galad is included in the same force as either Arwen, Lindir, Elladan & Elrohir or Bilbo Baggins, you automatically become impossible allies with all armies, and lose your army bonus.

[rohan] dernhelm.warning: You may only include Dernhelm if your force does not already include either Eowyn or Merry.

[rohan] eorl_the_young.warning: If Eorl the Young is included in the same force as any named Rohan Hero models, you automatically lose your army bonus and become impossible allies with all other army lists.

[rohan] helm_hammerhand.warning: If Helm Hammerhand is included in your force, you automatically become impossible allies with all other army lists.
Helm Hammerhand may not be included in the same force as any named Rohan Hero models.

[sharkey's_rogues] ruffian_cpt.warning: (Sharkey's Rogues) Warrior models may not lead warbands if the alliance level is 'Convenient' or 'Impossible', due to losing the necessary army bonus.

[survivors_of_lake-town] alfrid_the_coun.warning: (Survivors of Lake-town) Alfrid the Councillor may only be included if your army also includes either Bard the Bowman.

[the_chief's_ruffians] ruffian_cpt.warning: A Ruffian leading a warband may only be included if all of the other Hero models from this Legendary Legion are already included in this force.

[the_dead_of_dunharrow] rider_of_the_dea.warning: (The Dead of Dunharrow) Warrior models may not lead warbands if the alliance level is 'Convenient' or 'Impossible', due to losing the necessary army bonus.

[the_dead_of_dunharrow] warrior_of_the_d.warning: (The Dead of Dunharrow) Warrior models may not lead warbands if the alliance level is 'Convenient' or 'Impossible', due to losing the necessary army bonus.

[the_fellowship] arwen.warning: Arwen cannot be chosen unless Aragorn, Strider is in your force.

[the_fellowship] smeagol.warning: Smeagol may only be included in a warband that contains only Frodo and Sam.

[the_kingdom_of_khazad-dum] floi_stoneha.warning: Floi Stonehand cannot be included in the same force as any other named Heroes from The Kingdom of Khazad-Dum.

[the_rangers] arathorn.warning: If Arathorn is included in the same force as Aragorn, you automatically lose your army bonus and become impossible allies with all other army lists.

[the_shire] bandobras_took.warning: If Bandobras Took is included in the same force as any named Hobbit Hero models, you automatically lose your army bonus and become impossible allies with all other army lists.

[the_shire] bilbo_baggins.warning: If Bilbo is included in the same force as Frodo, Sam, Merry or Pippin, you automatically lose your army bonus and become impossible allies with all other army lists.

[the_shire] dunedain.warning: Dunedain may only be taken if your force also includes Gandalf.

[the_shire] gandalf_the_grey.warning: Gandalf may not be included in the same force as Frodo, Sam, Merry or Pippin.

[the_white_council] thrain_the_broken.warning: (The White Council) Thrain the Broken may only be included if Gandalf the Grey is also in your army.

[wildmen_of_druadan] woses_warrior_cpt.warning: (Wildmen of Druadan) Warrior models may not lead warbands if the alliance level is 'Convenient' or 'Impossible', due to losing the necessary army bonus.
